**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 208 1.1 **Archetype** [Medic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=257) **Prerequisites** [Medic Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6373) **Requirements** You are holding [healer's tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=25), or you are wearing them and have a hand free. --- You treat an adjacent creature in an attempt to reduce the [clumsy](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61), [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71), or [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91) condition. If a creature has multiple conditions from this list, choose one. Attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=3280) check against the condition using your [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=42) modifier as your counteract modifier and the condition’s source to determine the DC. You can’t treat a condition that came from an [artifact](/Traits.aspx?ID=537) or effect above 20th level unless you have [Legendary Medic](/Feats.aspx?ID=5169); even if you do, the counteract DC increases by 10. Treating a Condition that is continually applied under certain circumstances (for instance, the enfeebled condition a [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517) character gains from carrying a weapon with the [_unholy_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2851) rune) has no effect as long as the circumstances continue. **Critical Success** Reduce the condition value by 2.
**Success** Reduce the condition value by 1.
**Critical Failure** Increase the condition value by 1. Treat Condition leads to... [Holistic Care](/Feats.aspx?ID=6376)
